The restricted stock unit award vests in equal installments of 8-1/3% at the end of each three-month period following the date of grant, subject to the reporting person's continued service on the board of directors of the Issuer through such vesting date. Settlement of any vested restricted stock units will be made in the form of shares of common stock within 90 days following the end of the calendar quarter in which service on the board of directors terminates, but in no event later than December 31 of the year in which service terminates. Dividend equivalents will accrue on vested restricted stock units and will be notionally credited on each dividend payment date in respect of common stock with additional restricted stock units.
/s/ Steve W. Milton as attorney-in-fact for Lawrence W. Kellner 2015-11-13
